title: Episode 1058 - U.S. Food Shortage with Millennial Farmer
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: The Millennial Farmer joins the show to talk about how food inflation and gas price inflation are affecting the farming industry and his farm in particular, how the war in Ukraine is affecting American wheat farming, and if he’d ever consider growing wee...
itunes:summary:
The Millennial Farmer joins the show to talk about how food inflation and gas price inflation are affecting the farming industry and his farm in particular, how the war in Ukraine is affecting American wheat farming, and if he’d ever consider growing weed on his farm.
